panels.description: Total number of reconciliation per controller
panels.title: Reconciliation Total Count Per Controller

panels.description: Total number of reconciliation errors per controller
panels.title: Reconciliation Error Count Per Controller

panels.description: This panel consists of the average initialization time among all of the new GameServers from a batch of of GameServers (consisting of 1 or more) needing to be created in the reconciliation loop.
panels.title: Average Time Until GameServer Reaches StandBy

panels.description: The time it has taken to begin the initialization of every needed GameServer in the latest reconciliation loop.
panels.title: GameServer StandBy Reconciliation Time

panels.description: During a reconciliation loop, all GameServers marked as non-healthy or completed will have the time difference between now and their estimated time until deletion summed up and averaged.
panels.title: Average Estimated Time Until Hanging GameServer Clean Up

panels.description: The time it has taken to begin the scaling down/deletion of every inactive GameServer given a decrease in the number of allowed StandBy servers or a breach past the maximum allowed.
panels.title: GameServer Scale Down Time
